trans-unit.source: Step 7: Transform the Flat File Schema to the Insert Schema
trans-unit.target: Step 7: Transform the Flat File Schema to the Insert Schema

trans-unit.source: This section demonstrates how to map the elements in the incoming flat file message to the elements in the <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> message for the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: This section demonstrates how to map the elements in the incoming flat file message to the elements in the <embeddedLabel>Insert</embeddedLabel> message for the <embeddedLabel>Claims</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: To understand which elements in the source schema map to which elements in the destination schema, it is important to first look at the two schemas.
trans-unit.target: To understand which elements in the source schema map to which elements in the destination schema, it is important to first look at the two schemas.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the mapping requirements and the map operations to use to accomplish the message transformation:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the mapping requirements and the map operations to use to accomplish the message transformation:

trans-unit.source: What to map?
trans-unit.target: What to map?

trans-unit.source: How to achieve?
trans-unit.target: How to achieve?

trans-unit.source: All the elements in the flat-file schema map to relevant elements in the Insert message schema.
trans-unit.target: All the elements in the flat-file schema map to relevant elements in the Insert message schema.

trans-unit.source: For example, <embeddedLabel>ClaimID</embeddedLabel> maps to <embeddedLabel>ClaimID</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel> maps to <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: For example, <embeddedLabel>ClaimID</embeddedLabel> maps to <embeddedLabel>ClaimID</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel> maps to <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel>, and so on.

trans-unit.source: You directly connect the two nodes in the two schemas.
trans-unit.target: You directly connect the two nodes in the two schemas.

trans-unit.source: Because the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the Insert message schema gets its value by using the lookup configuration defined earlier, <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel> element in the flat file schema also maps to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the Insert schema by using a <embeddedLabel>Data Lookup</embeddedLabel> map operation.
trans-unit.target: Because the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the Insert message schema gets its value by using the lookup configuration defined earlier, <embeddedLabel>ClaimType</embeddedLabel> element in the flat file schema also maps to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the Insert schema by using a <embeddedLabel>Data Lookup</embeddedLabel> map operation.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="e1e209ac-0c75-42ea-93bc-61a83eba849b#BKMK_DataLookup" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To use a Data Lookup map operation</link>
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="e1e209ac-0c75-42ea-93bc-61a83eba849b#BKMK_DataLookup" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">To use a Data Lookup map operation</link>

trans-unit.source: After defining the map, include it in the bridge configuration defined in <link xlink:href="a8cffcf3-2815-4e19-84b5-5b75d8b3f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configure a One-Way Bridge</link>.
trans-unit.target: After defining the map, include it in the bridge configuration defined in <link xlink:href="a8cffcf3-2815-4e19-84b5-5b75d8b3f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configure a One-Way Bridge</link>.

trans-unit.source: To use a Data Lookup map operation
trans-unit.target: To use a Data Lookup map operation

trans-unit.source: Right-click the FlatFile_Bridge project, point to <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then click <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the FlatFile_Bridge project, point to <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then click <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel>, specify the map name as <userInput>FF_SQL_Transform.trfm</userInput>, and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select <embeddedLabel>Map</embeddedLabel>, specify the map name as <userInput>FF_SQL_Transform.trfm</userInput>, and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: On the map surface, select the source schema to <embeddedLabel>InsuranceClaim.xsd</embeddedLabel> and the destination schema to <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge_TableOperation.dbo.Claims.xsd</embeddedLabel> (Insert operation).
trans-unit.target: On the map surface, select the source schema to <embeddedLabel>InsuranceClaim.xsd</embeddedLabel> and the destination schema to <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge_TableOperation.dbo.Claims.xsd</embeddedLabel> (Insert operation).

trans-unit.source: On the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, from the <embeddedLabel>Misc Operations</embeddedLabel> category, drag-and-drop a <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> on the map surface.
trans-unit.target: On the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel>, from the <embeddedLabel>Misc Operations</embeddedLabel> category, drag-and-drop a <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> on the map surface.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the map operation, and for the <embeddedLabel>Property Name</embeddedLabel> text box, enter <userInput>ClaimTypeDescription</userInput>, and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Double-click the map operation, and for the <embeddedLabel>Property Name</embeddedLabel> text box, enter <userInput>ClaimTypeDescription</userInput>, and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Connect the <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: Connect the <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token> to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: As part of the bridge configuration, you had already configured the lookup such that the claim type description is already retrieved from the <token>ssSDSfull</token> and is assigned to a <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> property that gets created at runtime.
trans-unit.target: As part of the bridge configuration, you had already configured the lookup such that the claim type description is already retrieved from the <token>ssSDSfull</token> and is assigned to a <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> property that gets created at runtime.

trans-unit.source: Using the <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, you assign the value of that property to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.
trans-unit.target: Using the <embeddedLabel>Get Context Property</embeddedLabel> <token>mapop</token>, you assign the value of that property to the <embeddedLabel>ClaimTypeDescription</embeddedLabel> element in the destination schema.

trans-unit.source: Map the other elements in the source and destination schemas, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Map the other elements in the source and destination schemas, as shown below.

trans-unit.source: Save the map.
trans-unit.target: Save the map.

trans-unit.source: Save the project.
trans-unit.target: Save the project.

trans-unit.source: To add the map to the bridge configuration
trans-unit.target: To add the map to the bridge configuration

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge</embeddedLabel> project, open the .bridgeconfig file, and select the <embeddedLabel>Xml Transform</embeddedLabel> activity.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>FlatFile_Bridge</embeddedLabel> project, open the .bridgeconfig file, and select the <embeddedLabel>Xml Transform</embeddedLabel> activity.

trans-unit.source: From the <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel> pane, click the ellipsis button <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> against the <embeddedLabel>Maps</embeddedLabel> property to open the <embeddedLabel>Map Selection</embeddedLabel> dialog box.
trans-unit.target: From the <embeddedLabel>Properties</embeddedLabel> pane, click the ellipsis button <embeddedLabel>(…)</embeddedLabel> against the <embeddedLabel>Maps</embeddedLabel> property to open the <embeddedLabel>Map Selection</embeddedLabel> dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Select the check box for the <embeddedLabel>FF_SQL_Transform</embeddedLabel> map and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select the check box for the <embeddedLabel>FF_SQL_Transform</embeddedLabel> map and then click <embeddedLabel>OK</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Save changes to the project.
trans-unit.target: Save changes to the project.
